alert.note: Alert for Hertford; Pasquotank (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 8:41PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pasquotank, northwestern Perquimans, northern Bertie, southeastern Hertford, Gates and northwestern Chowan Counties through 930 PM EST... At 840 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers and embedded thunderstorms near Lewiston Woodville, or 7 miles south of Aulander, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ahoskie, Aulander, Gatesville, Sunbury, Ryland, Gates, Winton, Lewiston Woodville, Cofield, Powellsville, Colerain, Harrellsville, Roduco, Hobbsville, Corapeake, Union, Kelford, Askewville, Goose Pond and Whites Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
